titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the School of Architecture, Yale University, Memorabilia
School of Architecture, Yale University, Memorabilia
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:33

did.unittitle: School of Architecture, Yale University, memorabilia

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The memorabilia consists of printed material, photographs, a videotape, a film, a painting, essays and proposals, a Sketchbook and slides, and a Yale 2002 Building Project T-shirt documenting the Yale School of Architecture, its faculty and alumni. Includes non-Yale memorabilia.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 19-H (YRG 19-H), Audio-visual materials and memorabilia documenting the Yale School of Architecture.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The materials were transferred from the School of Architecture, 2002-2011.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Original audiovisual materials, as well as preservation and duplicating masters, may not be played. Researchers must consult use copies, or if none exist must pay for a use copy, which is retained by the repository. Researchers wishing to obtain an additional copy for their personal use should consult Copying Services information on the Manuscripts and Archives web site.

Original born digital files, as well as preservation masters, may not be accessed due to their fragility. Researchers must consult use copies, or if none exist request that they be made. Born digital files cannot be accessed remotely. System requirements include a Manuscripts and Archives computer and file viewing software.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: School of Architecture, Yale University, Memorabilia (RU 925). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The materials are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The memorabilia consists of printed material, photographs, a videotape, a film, a painting, essays and proposals, a Sketchbook and slides, and a Yale 2002 Building Project T-shirt documenting the Yale School of Architecture, its faculty and alumni.
